Information
------------------------------

Food Bank - Britain's Hidden Hunger
Aka The Food Bank: Scotland's Hidden Hunger
Over one million people were given emergency food in Britain in 2014, and the numbers are growing. This programme follows the stories of some of the people who get help from Scotland's busiest foodbank in Dundee. These include Charlie, who is left with no money to buy food after being the victim of a robbery, and single dad Billy, who is forced to get help from the foodbank to feed his four-year-old son Jack after a long spell out of work.
